name: Do You Know Da Wae?
description:
Do You Know Da Wae?

They say the meme died a long time ago... but did it really? Did Ugandan Knuckles really disappear, or will he make his return one last time? We think he does! Let us revive our brother! Share the news! #BringBackDaWae #ReviveKnuckles

Your goal in this game is to play as Knuckles to defeat the Evil Doge and find Da Wae!

Controls: Arrow keys to move and jump. If the start screen says "any button" you need to press Z or C.
